tool_description: Generates comprehensive product performance rankings based on multiple weighted metrics including sales, profitability, customer satisfaction, and market positioning.

product_ids.description: Products to include in ranking analysis

sales_scores.description: Sales performance scores for each product

customer_scores.description: Customer satisfaction scores for each product

inventory_scores.description: Inventory turnover scores for each product

sales_weight.description: Weight for sales metric in ranking (0-1)

profit_weight.description: Weight for profit metric in ranking (0-1)

customer_weight.description: Weight for customer metric in ranking (0-1)

inventory_weight.description: Weight for inventory metric in ranking (0-1)

ranking_method.description: Ranking calculation method: weighted_average, multiplicative, percentile

category_filter.description: Product categories to include in ranking

minimum_data_points.description: Minimum number of data points required per product

error_messages: Array length mismatch: All score arrays must have the same length as product_ids.
Invalid weights: All weight parameters must be between 0 and 1, and should sum to approximately 1.0.
Invalid ranking method: Use one of [weighted_average, multiplicative, percentile].
Invalid score values: All scores must be non-negative numbers.
Insufficient products: Need at least 2 products for meaningful ranking.
Weight sum error: The sum of all weight parameters should equal 1.0 (Â±0.01 tolerance).
usage: Provide product_ids and corresponding score arrays (sales_scores, profit_scores, customer_scores, inventory_scores). Optionally adjust weight parameters and ranking_method. Ensure all arrays have matching lengths and weights sum to 1.0.

ranked_products.description: Product IDs ranked from best to worst performance

composite_scores.description: Final composite scores for each product

ranking_summary.description: Summary of ranking methodology and key insights
